Sentence.value: Both parents must provide a copy of a nonworking gene for the child to have symptoms of the disorder.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Both parents must provide a copy of a nonworking gene for the [[child|C0008059]] to have [[symptoms|C1457887]] of the disorder.

Sentence.value: The disease results from defects in the ataxia telangiectasia mutated (ATM) gene.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[disease|C0012634]] results from defects in the [[ataxia telangiectasia|C0004135]] mutated (ATM) gene.

Sentence.value: Defects in this gene can lead to abnormal cell death around the body, including the part of the brain that helps coordinate movement.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Defects in this [[gene|C0017337]] can lead to abnormal [[cell death|C0007587]] around the body, including the part of the brain that helps coordinate movement.
